title: The Elderly are all of us, only a little older
creator_credit: Phillip Mark-Law, Don Anderson and Tasmanian Film Corporation
brief_description: Looks at the rehousing of elderly people in units with all modern conveniences. Follows the building of the units and the settling in of its new occupants together with their feelings about the move.
